content: If you like it, then I'll wear it.
info: 云果小故事-挚友服_云果故事线

content: It's one of her hand-sewn clothes! Gran'mama's really, really good at tailoring. She's made everything I've ever worn since I was little... Yeee?!
info: 云果小故事-挚友服_云果故事线

content: {A想到了}Wait, she also sent you something...
info: 云果小故事-挚友服_云果故事线

content: {A惊讶}W-Why does it look just like the one I'm wearin' mah~?!
info: 云果小故事-挚友服_云果故事线

content: {A惊叹}<style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, I got a letter from Gran'mama~! She got the passion fruit, and said it was good — no, it was "not bad at all"!
info: 云果小故事-挚友服_云果故事线

content: {A笑眯眯}I was kinda hopin' we'd wear the same thing, like... we're each other's most special person. <style=SizeSmall><style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, you are the sun.</style>
info: 云果小故事-挚友服_云果故事线

content: You don't like us wearing the same thing?
info: 云果小故事-挚友服_云果故事线

content: {A惊叹}N-No, I like it~! Please take this <style=Highlight>{挚友服}</style>, a-and please wear it~!
info: 云果小故事-挚友服_云果故事线

content: You've no idea how rare it is to hear that from Gran'mama. She didn't even call me a silly goose this time. I bet she's never seen a passion fruit before either~!
info: 云果小故事-挚友服_云果故事线

content: {A害羞冒烟}I-I'm so sorry! Gran'mama, y'know, sh-she only knows how to make a few styles... I um, I'll make you a new one...
info: 云果小故事-挚友服_云果故事线

content: {A害羞冒烟}Yeee?! I-I like it... but you can't keep pamperin' me like that mah~ I'll get all spoiled. Still, please take this <style=Highlight>{挚友服}</style>.
info: 云果小故事-挚友服_云果故事线
